author: Jill Layton
title: The most promising jobs of 2017 are in, and one could be right for you
text:
The most promising jobs of 2017 are in, and one could be right for you We’re gonna say it — 2017 isn’t looking great so far. At least not when it comes to the state of our country right now. So it’s always nice when there’s some positive news to share. LinkedIn has released a list of the most promising jobs of 2017 , so if you’re looking to switch things up on the career front , one of these jobs could be right for you .
LinkedIn ranked the jobs based on the potential for career advancement, job growth, and salary. There are 20 jobs listed, and every single job that made the cut has a high median salary, s trong job openings, and year-over-year growth. The jobs are also the most likely to lead to a promotion or advancement within an organization. 
Obviously those things are all pretty important when it comes to finding a job that’s right for you — you know, if you’re into that sort of thing (AKA money and career). 
LinkedIn also used data from member profiles to reveal the top skills associated with each job — most of which are in the finance, technology and healthcare fields. 
So take a look, and who knows…maybe you’ll be inspired to make a change.

Median Base Salary: $222,000
Job Openings (YoY Growth): 1,000+ (87%)
Career Advancement Score (out of 10): 6.0
Top Skills: Healthcare Management, Inpatient Care, Electronic Medical Record, Patient Safety, Internal Medicine
